Package util

Class SmartScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.SubScene
        • util.SmartScene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StarSystemScene
    public abstract class SmartScene
extends javafx.scene.SubScene
    This abstract class extends the class javafx.scene.SubScene and provides the functionality to control the translation and rotation of the Camera in a 3D Scene.
    Author:
    RKastner

      • rotate

        public void rotate​(javafx.geometry.Point3D pivot,
                   double dX,
                   double dY,
                   double dZ)
        Rotate the scene around the x, y and z axis for a set angle
        Parameters:
        pivot - the pivot point for the rotation
        dX - the angle in degree we rotate around the X-Axis
        dY - the angle in degree we rotate around the Y-Axis
        dZ - the angle in degree we rotate around the Z-Axis
